Scriptal.Name: Award Service Cross Medal
Scriptal.Description: Grants the Service Cross Medal to the Player Character Staff Member. Does not affect Snake.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: if not qvars.CrossMedalAwarded then qvars.CrossMedalAwarded = true InfCore.DebugPrint("Awarded Service Cross Medal") local tempstaffId = Player.GetStaffIdAtInstanceIndex(0) TppMotherBaseManagement.SetStaffCrossMedalByStaffId({ staffId = tempstaffId, got = true }) end
